Literature.Title: The introduction of L-phenylalanine into antimicrobial peptide protonectin enhances the selective antibacterial activity of its derivative phe-Prt against Gram-positive bacteria.
Literature.Author: Peng J, Qiu S, Jia F, Zhang L, He Y, Zhang F, Sun M, Deng Y, Guo Y, Xu Z, Liang X, Yan W, Wang K

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µM),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 23857(MIC=4µM)
